so_29801249: num=$(wc -l < ip.txt)
while read -r ip; do
    # Do your work, use $num as needed

    # Then decrement num
    num=$((num-1))
done < ip.txt

so_53959715: array=($(
    find . -type f -iname \*.json |
    sed -E 's|(.*/)*(.*_v)([0-9]+)\..*|\2 \3|' |
    sort -Vr | sort -uk1,1 | tr -d ' '
))

Explanations about Options.-V: natural sort of (version) numbers within text

so_29307073: #!/bin/bash
VAR1="/path/to/source/root"
VAR2="/path/to/target/root"
VAR3="50"

VARS=("VAR1" "VAR2" "VAR3")
for var in ${VARS[*]}; do
    echo "value of $var is ${!var}"
done
